sentences.en: Apply the wallpaper paste with a roller.
sentences.cn: 用滚子来涂墙纸的糨糊.

sentences.en: I can't stick the corners of this wallpaper down.
I want a wallpaper patterned with roses.
sentences.cn: 我要那种绘有玫瑰图案的墙纸.

sentences.en: The Coronata wallpaper lends a formal air to the dining room.
sentences.cn: 科罗娜塔墙纸给餐厅增添了一种整齐有致的气氛。

sentences.en: The paint wouldn't stick to the wallpaper.
sentences.cn: 这种漆不会粘在墙纸上。

sentences.en: The wallpaper comes in black and white only.
The wallpaper should match the furnishings.
sentences.cn: 墙纸应和家具陈设协调。

sentences.en: The wallpaper was peeling away close to the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 天花板附近的壁纸在剥落。

sentences.en: The wallpaper was streaky with grease.
They had the hall done out in striped wallpaper.
sentences.cn: 他们在大厅贴了有条纹的墙纸.

sentences.en: This rug tones in well with the wallpaper and furniture.
sentences.cn: 地毯和壁纸、家具配合得非常协调.

sentences.en: We hang the walls with wallpaper once a year.
We were going to wallpaper that room anyway.
sentences.cn: 反正我们本来就打算在那间屋里贴墙纸的。

trans.tran_en: paper that you stick onto the walls of a room in order to decorate it
